name: Pizza Rush (EduardoMonroy)
description:
You're a pizza delivery driver and you're stuck in the middle of heavy traffic. Your only option is to start weaving through traffic to ensure you get your pizza delivered to the customer. Along the way you’ll be able to pick up boosts that will speed up your car, just make sure you make it to the customers house with your car not completely wrecked or that's the end of your job. 

Credits:

All sounds and art assets were created by myself
